Magister Gaius:
Welcome to the Ivory Tower!
Magic is both a tool and a weapon, capale of great good and horrific evil. Even some of our most illustrious wizards have strayed into dark paths over the years. Only Elves have remained immute to corruption. But let me say this. Magic only reflects its user's own self, a point my old master understood too well. His work, now more than fifty years old, still makes me pause and think...
